stratego.mode

Class ModeWorker

  • java.lang.Object
    • stratego.mode.ModeWorker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LoginMenuWorker, MainMenuWorker, MultiplayerWorker, SettingsMenuWorker, SignupMenuWorker, SingleplayerWorker

    public abstract class ModeWorker
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This is the class the helps the UI and Network communicate, it controls the whole app while its active.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Networker net
      an Instance of the Networker object that can be used to send packets

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ModeWorker(java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentLinkedQueue<java.lang.Runnable> q)
      sets the Networker object and the tasklist that is used to get task from the Mode

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected stratego.mode.ModeWorker.PingRequest getPingRequest()
      returns a pingrequest which is a runnable that will ping the server, since pinging is the most simple network action that is always the same this is available for any subclass to use.
      abstract java.lang.Runnable getRequest(java.lang.String name)
      a Method that any subclass must override.
      java.lang.Runnable getRequest(java.lang.String name, java.lang.Object... arg)
      a Method that any subclass must override.
      protected java.lang.Runnable getTask()
      polls the next runnable from the task queue
      protected boolean handlePacket(java.net.DatagramPacket p)
      preforms an operation based on the contents of a packet recieved from the Network.
      void run()
      this method is set up to run all request from the Mode as well and pass all packets from the network to the handlePacket Method, it also runs anything added to the todo list for the Worker
      protected void setRunning(boolean b)
      sets the value of the running field, once running is set to false the run method will exit after the it finishes checking the todo list as well as the packet list from the Network
      protected void setTodo(java.lang.Runnable[] todo)
      this sets the todo array for the ModeWorker, this is an array of runnables that will be executed after the request from the UI are processed and before the Network is checked for packets

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • net

        protected Networker net
        an Instance of the Networker object that can be used to send packets

    • Constructor Detail

      • ModeWorker

        public ModeWorker(java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentLinkedQueue<java.lang.Runnable> q)
        sets the Networker object and the tasklist that is used to get task from the Mode
        Parameters:
        q - the queue that the Mode uses to pass request to the Mode Worker

    • Method Detail

      • getRequest

        public abstract java.lang.Runnable getRequest(java.lang.String name)
        a Method that any subclass must override. This returns request to the Mode object.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the request to be returned
        Returns:
        returns a Runnable object that preforms the task requested.

      • getRequest

        public java.lang.Runnable getRequest(java.lang.String name,
                                     java.lang.Object... arg)
        a Method that any subclass must override. This returns request to the Mode object.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the request to be returned.
        arg - a list of arguments for the task to use.
        Returns:
        returns a Runnable object that preforms the task requested.

      • run

        public void run()
        this method is set up to run all request from the Mode as well and pass all packets from the network to the handlePacket Method, it also runs anything added to the todo list for the Worker
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • getTask

        protected java.lang.Runnable getTask()
        polls the next runnable from the task queue
        Returns:
        returns the runnable from the top of the queue

      • setRunning

        protected void setRunning(boolean b)
        sets the value of the running field, once running is set to false the run method will exit after the it finishes checking the todo list as well as the packet list from the Network
        Parameters:
        b - the value to set running to.

      • setTodo

        protected void setTodo(java.lang.Runnable[] todo)
        this sets the todo array for the ModeWorker, this is an array of runnables that will be executed after the request from the UI are processed and before the Network is checked for packets
        Parameters:
        todo - array of runnables

      • handlePacket

        protected boolean handlePacket(java.net.DatagramPacket p)
        preforms an operation based on the contents of a packet recieved from the Network. This method is set up to handle just the basic packets to make the application function, but this method should be overriden by any subclass that wants to interface with the Network
        Parameters:
        p - the Datagram packet that was recieved by the Network
        Returns:
        true if the packet was handled successfully false it it failed to be handled

      • getPingRequest

        protected stratego.mode.ModeWorker.PingRequest getPingRequest()
        returns a pingrequest which is a runnable that will ping the server, since pinging is the most simple network action that is always the same this is available for any subclass to use.
        Returns:
        returns a runnable that will ping the server.
